summary: Barbarella, an astronaut from the 41st century, sets out to find and stop the evil scientist Durand Durand, whose Positronic Ray threatens to bring evil back into the galaxy.
cast: Jane Fonda|John Phillip Law|Anita Pallenberg|Milo O'Shea|Marcel Marceau|Claude Dauphin|Véronique Vendell|Giancarlo Cobelli|Serge Marquand|Nino Musco|Franco Gulà|Catherine Chevallier|Marie Therese Chevallier|Umberto Di Grazia|David Hemmings|Ugo Tognazzi|Honey Autumn|Silvana Bacci|Loriana Bartella|Marina Bartella|Diane Bond|Vita Borg|Chantal Cachin|Carla Cassola|Giuseppe Castellano|Tania de Paolis|Fabienne Fabre|Sergio Ferrero|Corinne Fontaine|Sadre Girodani|Gara Granda|Beatrice Lanscat|Katiuska Lanvin|Judith Matah|Janet McLeod|Susan Moren|Gabriella Morganti|María Teresa Orsini|Talitha Pol|Fred Robsahm|Carla Rousso|Antonio Sabato|Jean Saudray|Kitty Swan|Fabio Testi|Romolo Valli|Silvana Venturelli|Barbara Winer
title: Barbarella
